name: Classic Car City Smash 3D
description:
Rev up the big V8 Engine as you conquer the city streets. Smash trucks, rally cars, bus stops, and anything else in your way. You asked for it, and we deliver. This is a natural follow up to Turbo Truck Racing 3D, which is an awesome blend of high-octane driving and off road racing. Classic Car 3D City Racing is soon to become the #1 classic car racing game with outstanding 3D graphics and fast gameplay. Packed with ultra realistic sounds and car driving physics including real drifting. Complete the objective before time runs out.
This is Classic Car 3D City Racing. It includes racing in the city streets and even some countryside roads. Features amazing vehicles, addictive gameplay and intense competition. Barrel through packed streets, crash into everything, smash into traffic, and perform dynamic, high-speed aerial stunts! This game will challenge even the most skilled racing fans.

Game Features:
- Two of the most popular classic cars
- 4 Action packed levels with 32 Missions
- One touch game play for loads of driving fun with drift
-High-quality graphics and fun gameplay
